Reviews.Title: “Ok hotel, but very close to Termini”
Reviews.Author: Courtneylogic
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel europa 2 nights travelling throughout europe sister chose hotel close termini stations 5 minute walk convenient sightseeing staff arrival friendly helping oversized backpacks english little rusty understand expect speak english europe 2 nights clean comfy bed wasnt special actually little trouble trying key door time staff wernt helpful hotel lift slow faster climb stairs lady reception able provide map rome directions nearest internet cafe hotel internet charges expensive receptionist actually suggested internet cafe instead didnt feel safe walking termini evenings quick walk streets lit checkout staff hold luggage returned sightseeing jumping train southern italy hotel flash convenient priced

Reviews.Title: “Don't believe all the negative reviws”

Reviews.Content: please don’t opinion europa hotel based negative reviews written site don’t hotel writing negative reviews europa hotel via rome wife spent fantastic 3 days rome beginning october 2011 staying europa hotel check smooth handled roberto pleasant willing answer questions staff friendly helpful professional cleaning staff wearing uniforms north american hotels europe bathroom beautiful clean lots towels supply toiletries floor front hotel elevator normally carry own bags windows noise street air conditioning mini bar store drinks ice drinks minutes bowl ice breakfast beautiful selection food 17 day trip added bonus hotel unlimited fast internet bar location 2 short blocks via termini rail station safe walking night mixture hotels apartments restaurants people walking base location sights rome metro local buses hop hop buses short 2 blocks please time look pictures tell real story thank roberto staff europa hotel trip rome enjoyable staying trip beautiful city
